main event: A civilian reported seeing two unidentified flying objects (UFOs) in Hartsdale, New York in December 1960.
interesting points: The sighting involved two UFOs observed within a 2-minute period., One UFO hovered and changed brightness before disappearing behind trees., The second UFO appeared suddenly and was visible for only 10 seconds., The observer noted that the objects could not have been airplanes due to their speed., The observer has a previous sighting reported on October 4, 1969.
